sourcesContent:
import {create} from 'zustand'

const useFavouritesStore = create((set) => ({
    favourites: [],
    addFav: (payload) => set((state) => ([state.favourites.push(payload)])),
    removeFav: (payload) => set((state) => {let filtrados = state.favourites.filter((char) => char.id !== Number(payload))
    console.log(filtrados)
    [state.favourites = filtrados]} )
}))

export default useFavouritesStore
